title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: The Project Properties Info page uses text fields instead of labels for displaying information like Path, Type, etc.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should use labels instead of text fields. The labels should be read-only so that their values cannot be edited by the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue, 1. Select a Project, 2. Right-click and choose Properties, 3. On the subsequent Info page, observe that the fields (Path, Type, etc.) are displayed as text fields.
